mapper.select:
select top 10
from (select row_number() over(order by OrderId) as RowNumber,* from [order] nolock) A WHERE RowNumber>(#{pageNo}-1)*10 AND UseTime between #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY UseTime

select top 10
from (select row_number() over(order by OrderId) as RowNumber,* from [order] nolock) A WHERE RowNumber>(#{pageNo}-1)*10 AND UseTime between #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} AND OrderStatus='Submitted' ORDER BY UseTime

select top 10
from (select row_number() over(order by OrderId) as RowNumber,* from [order] nolock) A WHERE RowNumber>(#{pageNo}-1)*10 AND DriverMobile=#{mobile} and UseTime between #{beginTime} AND #{endTime}
AND LOWER(OrderStatus) = LOWER(#{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
ORDER BY UseTime
